edu.iastate.ansci.flip

Class Chromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.Chromosome
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Chromosome
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains an animal's allele for a specific ChromosomeInfo and implements the rules for creating them.
    It should be noted that the sex is determined prior to creating the chromosome
    The rules for creating the alleles for founders are contained in or cInfo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
